sqlMap.update: update localgisguiaurbana.attribute set attributename = #attributename:VARCHAR#, attributeidgeopista = #attributeidgeopista:NUMERIC#, layerid = #layerid:INTEGER#, attributeidalias = #attributeidalias:NUMERIC# mapid = #mapid:NUMERIC# where attributeid = #attributeid:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select: select a.attributeid as attributeid, a.attributename as attributename, a.attributeidgeopista as attributeidgeopista, a.layerid as layerid, a.attributeidalias as attributeidalias, a.mapid as mapid from localgisguiaurbana.attribute a where a.layerid = #idLayer# and a.mapid=#idMap#

select a.attributeid as attributeid, a.attributename as attributename, a.attributeidgeopista as attributeidgeopista, a.layerid as layerid, a.attributeidalias as attributeidalias, a.mapid as mapid from localgisguiaurbana.attribute a, localgisguiaurbana.layer l, localgisguiaurbana.restricted_attribute ra where a.layerid = l.layerid and a.attributeidgeopista = ra.attributeidgeopista and l.layeridgeopista = #idLayerGeopista# and ra.mappublic = #mapPublic#

select a.attributeid as attributeid, a.attributename as attributename, a.attributeidgeopista as attributeidgeopista, a.layerid as layerid, a.attributeidalias as attributeidalias, d.traduccion as alias from localgisguiaurbana.attribute a inner join localgisguiaurbana.layer l on a.layerid = l.layerid and l.layername = #nameLayer# inner join localgisguiaurbana.maplayer ml on l.layerid = ml.layerid inner join localgisguiaurbana.map m on ml.mapid = m.mapid and m.mappublic = #mapPublic# left outer join dictionary d on d.id_vocablo = a.attributeidalias and d.locale = #locale#

select l.name as layername,c.name as attributename,pattern,dt.traduccion,dt.locale from attributes a inner join columns c on (a.id_column = c.id) left join columns_domains cd on (c.id = cd.id_column) inner join tables t on (c.id_table = t.id_table) inner join layers l on (a.id_layer= l.id_layer) inner join domainnodes dn on (dn.id_domain=c.id_domain) inner join dictionary dt on (dn.id_description=dt.id_vocablo) where l.name=#nameLayer# and c.id_domain is not null and type=7 and (dt.locale = #locale# or dt.locale = 'es_ES')

select a.attributeid as attributeid, a.attributename as attributename, a.attributeidgeopista as attributeidgeopista, a.layerid as layerid, a.attributeidalias as attributeidalias, d.traduccion as alias from localgisguiaurbana.attribute a inner join localgisguiaurbana.layer l on a.layerid = l.layerid and l.layerid = #idLayer# inner join localgisguiaurbana.maplayer ml on l.layerid = ml.layerid inner join localgisguiaurbana.map m on ml.mapid = m.mapid and m.mapid= #idMap# and m.mappublic = #mapPublic# left outer join dictionary d on d.id_vocablo = a.attributeidalias and d.locale = #locale#
